card.description: Survey of customers in an Indian restaurant on whether or not they like certain naan combinations.

context.potentialUses: Help make recommendations for what kind of naan a new customer should order.

chicken.description: Does the naan have chicken baked in?

lamb.description: Does the naan have lamb baked in?

onion.description: Does the naan have onion baked in?

potatoes.description: Does the naan have potatoes baked in?

nuts.description: Does the naan have nuts baked in?

cherries.description: Does the naan have cherries baked in?

shaved coconut.description: Does the naan have shaved coconut baked in?

garlic.description: Does the naan have garlic baked in?

cheese.description: Does the naan have cheese baked in?

preference.description: Do you like or dislike the naan?
